attributes.action: Make University more cost friendly to people who may not be able to afford it
attributes.additional_details: We want this to be changed because it is extremely expensive and alot of people dont go for this reason however alot of jobs require degrees.
attributes.background: We want lower prices for everyone and to make it more accessible so that people can access it. We also want it to be cheaper because majority of people in University leave with debt and struggle to pay it back.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.Universities can charge what they choose up to the fees cap. 

We could accept a petition calling for the cap to be lowered, if that is what you would like.
